survey_name: Public Library Digital Resource Usage Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand how patrons use digital resources provided by public libraries, including e-books, online databases, and virtual programs, to improve services and accessibility.

questions.question_text: How often do you use the digital resources (e-books, online databases, virtual programs) offered by your public library?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Ensure answer options cover all frequency ranges to capture accurate usage patterns.

script.question_text: How often do you use the digital resources (e-books, online databases, virtual programs) offered by your public library?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: Which of the following digital resources do you use? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who selected any option other than 'Never' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for unlisted resources.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: multi-choice checkboxes with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following digital resources do you use? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who selected any option other than 'Never' in Q1.

questions.question_text: What challenges, if any, do you face when using the library's digital resources? (Open-ended)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who selected any option other than 'Never' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: An open-ended question helps identify pain points not covered in predefined options.

script.question_text: What challenges, if any, do you face when using the library's digital resources? (Open-ended)
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who selected any option other than 'Never' in Q1.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the library's digital resource offerings?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who selected any option other than 'Never' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels clearly.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the library's digital resource offerings?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who selected any option other than 'Never' in Q1.

questions.question_text: What additional digital resources or services would you like the library to offer? (Open-ended)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended responses can reveal unmet needs and inspire future improvements.

script.question_text: What additional digital resources or services would you like the library to offer? (Open-ended)
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
